name: Data Solution Architect
description:
ScienceSoft is looking for Data Solution Architect!

Data(DWH, ETL, Data Mining ) ML and AI solution for financial organization, include predictions, fraud detection, market analytics and user (companies and persons) behavior.
Integration with existing infrastructure and software. Cloud and on-premise.


Skills:

  • Experience in software development from 8 years;
  • Experience as Architect/Team lead not less than 3 years;
  • Full project life-cycle data warehouse\ML design and implementation including ETL and Reporting;
  • Logical and Physical data modelling;
  • Experience in data engineering and custom coding using Python, Java, or Scala;
  • Experience in SQL and NoSQL databases;
  • Experience with real-time analytics and event driven architecture;
  • Experience managing Spark and/or Kafka clusters on-prem or in the cloud;
  • Experience with Data lake or Delta Lake;
  • Experience with Cloud Data Solutions (Azure, AWS);
  • Experience in data platforms;
  • Experience in BI tools;
  • Experience with Data Science toolsets and technology.


Responsibilities:

  • Organizing and planning software deployments;
  • Architecting solutions;
  • Capacity planning;
  • Being our single point of contact for architecture and technical related subjects;
  • Taking part in development and RFP processes.
